message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $9,500. I think it would be very valuable to you, and this is a very competitive price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8,500?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $8,500 is a bit too low for me. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. After careful consideration, I am able to offer $8,750 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
